DOC.brief_summary: The aims of this study are: 1. to investigate if HIV infection alters the antibody responses to influenza and 2. to assess the ability of licensed influenza vaccine to induce functional non-neutralising antibodies in HIV-infected and HIV-uninfected subjects.
DOC.criteria: HIV1 positive by licensed diagnostic test (for HIVpositive group only) Planning to receive the seasonal influenza vaccine outside the study Provision of written informed consent Previous allergy to influenza vaccination Pregnancy or planning to become pregnant Unwilling or unable to provide blood samples
